Utilities¶

Json Manager Utilities¶

json_justify.jason.keymapper(dict_like)¶

This function is used to take a function and then reutrn dict that will be used later

Args:
dict_like (list,set): A dict that will be used for the later functionalities like mapping this is basically used to create a mapping of render and attris function functionaliies creation

json_justify.jason.render_factory(js, render_tup)¶
class json_justify.utils.ErrorResponse(response=None)¶

This class is creted and implemented in later version Just a dummy version of classes

class json_justify.utils.Level(level)¶

This class will be used to set Level of runtime

level¶

This is used to set level

Args:
Level (int): Level of Production
class json_justify.utils.PlaceHolder¶

This is Placeholder class used to create data of field or any other object where data is not set
